column4: Hey does anyone know why is it that when I record my screen with Kazam Screencaster, my computer suddenly becomes laggy?
no
why you dont do it yourself?
Do what myself?
what you just said, format
To reformat I will need the Windows disc, but my laptop doesn't come with it. Besides, I asked for a recovery disc and they told me I had to pay.
so why dont you get an windows copy, there so much torrents from original win 7 and such
I've already tried that, but the thing is that: If I were to install windows 7 by torrenting, it would give me the results of a desktop one, not allowing me to connect to wireless network and such.
why not???
im running ubuntu 12.10 with nvidia optimus (from bumblebee)
You know, I don't really feel like going to the terminal and typing optirun blablabla. Its really tiring you know.
you can add the bumblebee repo available from launchpad and install it, and you another GUI to allow you to run apps from optirun
still i dont use to use optirun, im simply satisfied to have bumblebee runing that puts only the notebook temperature in good levels
I've done sudo apt-get install bumblebee , what do I do now>
https://launchpad.net/~bumblebee/+archive/stable
first you need to add the repo, but go to that link and read
Ubuntu 12.10 has issues with Nvidia
The desktop will not show if I were to install it.
what???
Simply putting it, there's going to be a bug if I install Nvidia n ow.
please read https://github.com/Bumblebee-Project/Bumblebee/wiki
im running 12.10 so that you know
i have no clue from where did you get that, but i assure you i have no issues
